      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String cleanId(String uncleanId)
      Converts an unclean id to a clean id
      Note: clean ids can be used as valid file or path names, while unclean ids cannot be used for such purposes

      Constructs the pairtree path associated with the given HTRC clean id

      • parse

        public static PairtreeHelper.PairtreeDocument parse(String filePath)
                                             throws InvalidPairtreePathException
        Parses an HTRC pairtree file path into a PairtreeHelper.PairtreeDocument that can be used to extract metadata about the document
        Parameters:
        filePath - The pairtree file path
        Returns:
        The PairtreeHelper.PairtreeDocument
        Throws:
        InvalidPairtreePathException - Thrown if the given filePath is not a valid pairtree path

      • parse

        public static PairtreeHelper.PairtreeDocument parse(File file)
                                             throws IOException,
                                                    InvalidPairtreePathException
        Parses an HTRC pairtree file into a PairtreeHelper.PairtreeDocument that can be used to extract metadata about the document
        Parameters:
        file - The pairtree file
        Returns:
        The PairtreeHelper.PairtreeDocument
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the canonical path of the given file cannot be resolved
        InvalidPairtreePathException - Thrown if the given filePath is not a valid pairtree path
